title: How to Make a Fortune Teller out of an Empty Toilet Paper Roll

steps.headline: Take the remains of your toilet paper roll.
Push it down flat and let it come up.
With scissors, cut the folded edges.
steps.description: This will make the roll fall into 2 pieces.

steps.headline: Now make the fortune teller.
steps.description: It may be a little frustrating, considering the fact that the folds may be stiff. If you don't know how to make a fortune teller, follow the steps below or look it up on another article.

steps.headline: Fold it in half the other way.
You should see the square divided into 4 sections.
steps.description: Fold and crease each corner until the tips reach the middle.

steps.headline: Turn it to the back.
steps.description: Do not unfold anything. Repeat step 8 onto the back, and still don't unfold anything.

steps.headline: Fold it in half.
steps.description: Unfold. Fold it in half the other way, and unfold it again.

steps.headline: Fold it diagonally in.
steps.description: Now unfold it. Fold it out, and make the sides on  the outside stick out. Unfold.

steps.headline: Pop in the middle.
steps.description: 2 sides will start to come in. Fold them in, not out, and put the other sides on top of them to make a square.

steps.headline: Find the flaps.
steps.description: Put your fingers in them and there you have it.

text: Take the remains of your toilet paper roll.  Push it down flat and let it come up.  With scissors, cut the folded edges. This will make the roll fall into 2 pieces. Pick 1 rectangle. Cut it into a square. Now make the fortune teller. It may be a little frustrating, considering the fact that the folds may be stiff. If you don't know how to make a fortune teller, follow the steps below or look it up on another article. Fold it in half. Unfold. Fold it in half the other way. Unfold. You should see the square divided into 4 sections. Fold and crease each corner until the tips reach the middle. Turn it to the back. Do not unfold anything. Repeat step 8 onto the back, and still don't unfold anything. Fold it in half. Unfold. Fold it in half the other way, and unfold it again. Fold it diagonally in. Now unfold it. Fold it out, and make the sides on  the outside stick out. Unfold. Pop in the middle. 2 sides will start to come in. Fold them in, not out, and put the other sides on top of them to make a square. Find the flaps. Put your fingers in them and there you have it.
